projects.Title: Mamma Mia
projects.Description: The first big Student-Run musical post COVID. Matt wrote arrangements, assisted in rehearsal, and performed on Piano.

projects.Title: Spring Awakening
projects.Organization: Tufts Department of Theater, Dance, and Performance Studies
projects.Description: Matt worked alongside professional directors, designers, and technicians to deliver a spectacular performance of this evocative show. He ran pit rehersals, assisted the cast in vocal rehearsals, and coordinated with production staff

projects.Title: Lightning Thief
projects.Description: Matt directed the pit and assisted in vocal rehearsals for this production.

projects.Title: Chicago
projects.Description: Matt was called in with a week's notice to conduct the pit for this production.

projects.Title: Into the Woods
projects.Description: Matt planned and lead vocal and pit rehearsals for this challenging and successful production.

projects.Title: Little Women
projects.Description: Matt planned and lead vocal and pit rehearsals for this production, with a condensed three-week timeline.
